title: Move to Arcade 7
body: Update to a recent Arcade, and fix fallout from updated xUnit analyzers and new Arcade TFMs.

commit.message:
darc update-dependencies --channel ".NET 7 Eng"

Updating 'Microsoft.DotNet.Arcade.Sdk': '6.0.0-beta.22458.2' => '7.0.0-beta.22464.4' (from build '20220914.4' of 'https://github.com/dotnet/arcade')
Updating 'Microsoft.DotNet.XUnitExtensions': '6.0.0-beta.22458.2' => '7.0.0-beta.22464.4' (from build '20220914.4' of 'https://github.com/dotnet/arcade')

Swap assertion argument order

This fixes an xUnit2000 warning that expected/actual were likely wrong.

Explicitly reference System.IO.Compression in Engine tests

I think this was coming in before through transitive reference.
Account for new Arcade logger TFM

nodes.body: Blocked by dotnet/arcade#10939 so going back to draft.
https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/7991 seems to be updating to arcade 7. Close this?
